description: Spring Boot Grafana Dashboard showing Basic, HTTP and JVM metrics from Prometheus, as well as Logs from Loki.

targets.expr:
avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{uri=~`${uri:regex}`, method=~"${http_method:regex}", host="$host"}[$__rate_interval])) by (uri, method) /
avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{uri=~`${uri:regex}`, method=~"${http_method:regex}", host="$host"}[$__rate_interval])) by (uri, method) * 1000
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{uri=~`${uri:regex}`, method=~"${http_method:regex}", status=~"5..", host="$host"}[$__rate_interval]) * $__interval_ms / 1000) by (agent, method, uri)

((sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{uri=~`${uri:regex}`, method=~"${http_method:regex}", host="$host"}[$__rate_interval])) by(method, uri) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{uri=~`${uri:regex}`, method=~"${http_method:regex}", host="$host"}[$__rate_interval])) by(method, uri) >= 0) OR on() vector(0)) * 1000

title: Spring Boot Statistics & Endpoint Metrics
